Leviticus

The tables below show the Hebrew and Greek texts aligned vertically. When a Hebrew verse number does not match the Greek counterpart, the editors added a note with the corresponding verse number between square brackets.

Chapter 1

Verse 1

Masoretic text Septuagint

    ×•××ª ×”×‘×’×“×™× ÎºÎ±Î¹ Ï„Î±Ï‚ ÏƒÏ„Î¿Î»Î±Ï‚ Î±Ï…Ï„Î¿Ï…

  • 379 Distributive rendering, occurring once in the translation but referring to more than one Hebrew word.

    ×ª×©×¨×¤×• â€¢440 ÎºÎ±Ï„Î±ÎºÎ±Ï…Î¸Î·ÏƒÎµÏ„Î±Î¹

  • 440 Change from active to passive form in verbs.

    ××œ×”× Ï€ÏÎ¿Ï‚ Î±Ï…Ï„Î¿Ï…Ï‚
